title: Welcome to JPN
body: The mission of the group is to raise awareness and display various aspects about Japan and its culture to the Washington University community. We also attempt to establish ethnic identity on campus. The club offers the Washington University community the opportunity for those interested in Japan and its culture to interact with each other through club events while pursuing their interest in Japan.

title: Sushi
body: Our Sushi Night was novermber 7, and it was popping!. Thanks to everyone who came.

title: Omatsuri
body:
Biggest Night of the year.

Great to see all of you guys again. Can wait for anothe great one next year.

title: Snack Sale
body: Thanks to all our loyal members we were able to raise over $500 for this semester. We can't wait to apply this money to Omatsuri.

title: GBM
body: JPN is back!!! Head over to our first GBM to see all the great stuff we'll be doing this semester.

title: Green Tea Icecream Social
body: It was awesome to meet all the new members. Can't wait to see you again at sushi night
